column3: I got bills I gotta pay
column4: So I'm gon' work work work every day
column5: I got mouths I gotta feed
column6: So I'm gon' make sure everybody eats
column10: All these bills piled up on my desk
column12: All the little kids runnin' 'round you can hear their stomachs growlin'
column13: There's a full moon out,, and my girl just keep on howlin'
column14: Says she gon' leave me if I don't come home with 50 thousand (50 thousand?)
column17: God damn,, god damn,, god damn
column18: Oh man,, oh man,, oh man
column19: God damn,, oh man,, god damn,, oh man
column24: Woke up and I bumped my head
column25: Stubbed my toe on the edge of the bed
column26: Opened the fridge and the food all gone
column27: Neighbor's damn dog done crapped on my lawn
column28: Hopped in the car and the car won't start
column29: It's too damn hot but I still gotta walk
column30: Behind an old lady in the grocery line
column31: Praying that my card don't get declined
